channel.title: Retail
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Retail" - Needs a header section

item.title: Retail
item.content:encoded: The upcoming new content that's already got two pages, Truck Loading and Perfect Poker, should be slotted into the header somehow. I tried looking for a Shop page, since Retail seems to be all about the Shop, but there's only the Store which looks incredibly out of date.
